mapper.select: select user_id, username, realname, password, age, email, phone, address, birthday, sex, create_by, update_by, create_date, update_date from sys_user where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user(username, realname, password, age, email, phone, address, birthday, sex, create_by, update_by, create_date, update_date) values (#{username}, #{realname}, #{password}, #{age}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{birthday}, #{sex}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate})

insert into sys_user(username, realname, password, age, email, phone, address, birthday, sex, create_by, update_by, create_date, update_date) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.realname}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.age}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.birthday}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.createDate}, #{entity.updateDate})

insert into sys_user(username, realname, password, age, email, phone, address, birthday, sex, create_by, update_by, create_date, update_date) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.realname}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.age}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.birthday}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.createDate}, #{entity.updateDate})
on duplicate key update username = values(username), realname = values(realname), password = values(password), age = values(age), email = values(email), phone = values(phone), address = values(address), birthday = values(birthday), sex = values(sex), create_by = values(create_by), update_by = values(update_by), create_date = values(create_date), update_date = values(update_date)
mapper.update:
update sys_user
username = #{username},
realname = #{realname},
password = #{password},
age = #{age},
email = #{email},
phone = #{phone},
address = #{address},
birthday = #{birthday},
sex = #{sex},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_by = #{updateBy},
create_date = #{createDate},
update_date = now(),
where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select user_id, username, realname, password, age, email, phone, address, birthday, sex, create_by, update_by, create_date, update_date from sys_user where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
